channel.title: How to relocate npc to new home
channel.description:
how do i relocate npc's to new home. when i spawn the npc's and then restart server they are gone agian. i cant find the .java file with the npc locations.
can someone please post how to do this.

item.title: How to relocate npc to new home
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

ok well looks like u found out where to change them, i am bored so i will explain the code to u for fun

"Loyalty_Shop- that is the name
“13727”- that is the npc id
“2876”- #1 of the 2 coords
“3540”- #2 of the 2 coords
“0”- that is the height
“false”- self explanatory lol

Read full topic
item.source: How to relocate npc to new home

item.title: How to relocate npc to new home
item.dc:creator: @Master_claw Master claw
item.description:
@Master_claw wrote:

my server is 718/742

do i just edit those to the new spawn point.

SLAYER(9085, 2860, 3539, 0, false), LOYALTY_SHOP(13727, 2876, 3540, 0, false), FATHER_AERECK(456, 2854, 3532, 0, false), MANAGER(13768, 2876, 3541, 0, false), GENERAL_STORE(529, 2868, 3533, 0, false), AJJAT(4288, 2852, 3535, 0, false), HIGH_LEVEL(551, 2852, 3537, 0, false), TELEPORTS(230, 2865, 3537, 0, false), WC_SHOP(519, 2875, 3546, 0, false), HERB_SHOP(587, 2889, 3535, 0, false), POTIONS(576, 2847, 3538, 0, false), RANGED(550, 2856, 3539, 0, false), BARROWS(3820, 2856, 3537, 0, false), WEAPON_STORE(538, 2856, 3535, 0, false), HORVIK_ARMOR(549, 2857, 3533, 0, false), HUNTER(5112, 2886, 3533, 0, false), FOOD_SHOP(8864, 2847, 3548, 0, false), MAGIC_SHOP(546, 2845, 3546, 0, false), PURE_SHOP(457, 2851, 3533, 0, false), SKILLCAPES(548, 2883, 3541, 0, false),

item.title: How to relocate npc to new home
item.dc:creator: @marc110 marc110
item.description:
@marc110 wrote:

[quote=“Master claw, post:1, topic:514603”]how do i relocate npc’s to new home. when i spawn the npc’s and then restart server they are gone agian. i cant find the .java file with the npc locations.

can someone please post how to do this.[/quote]

there inside spawn-config.cfg on my server , it mite be called somthing else on your server but its a cfg file

you don’t need to compile after editing this file

Read full topic
item.source: How to relocate npc to new home

item.title: How to relocate npc to new home
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

That’s because the npc you spawn is temporary.

You need to add it to the spawn.cfg, in order for it to be the permanently.

Read full topic
item.source: How to relocate npc to new home
